item.title: Backing up MySQL
item.description: <img src="/media/MySQL.png" alt="Image via Wikipedia" /> <figcaption> <p> Image via Wikipedia </p> </figcaption> I don’t know very many people that haven’t been devastated by the loss of data… Yet I am baffled that millions of professional IT workers still ignore backing up their data. Since computers are great at doing repetitive things like backups.. why not spend 20 minutes setting up your machine to backup your files for you.
